title: I CANT TAKE MY FREE 400RP HELP ME
body:
RIOT I CANT TAKE MY FREE 400RP I AM 5 LEVEL . PLEASE HELP ME 
thanks... (nick MainRengarSmurf){{champion:107}}

replies.body: New accounts no longer receive RP at level 5.  They will now receive [new player hextech chests](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp).  Check your hextech for the chest and key, but keep in mind it may be a bit for that to update and appear on your account.  I hope that helps clear things up!
You don't get it anymore they changed it so you get a chest
